text: Kintu yara e samarthya thakabe na, eke an'yake sparsa karara age take ekadikrame du’masa siyama palana karate habe; ye tate'o asamartha, se satajana misakinake kha'oyabe [1]; eta e jan'ye ye, tomara yena allah‌ o tamra rasulera upara imana ana. Ara egulo allah‌ra nirdharita bidhana; ara kaphiradera jan'ya rayeche yantranadayaka sasti
